concept.title: Edit Blocks
concept.shortdesc: The Block Editor contains an independent area in which you can create and edit block definition as you would in the drawing area. Click “BEDIT” to enter the block edit modes.

ul.li: Update (Redefine) block definition (not support dynamic block yet) in Block Editor
Save as Block or write block as a drawing file
Define attributes to an edited block

conbody.p: When you define a block by opening it in Block Editor or select an existing block to open in Block Editor, the contextual tab or toolbar will be displayed as follows, and the drawing area will turn to grey color. In Block Editor, you can define the objects for a block definition, and save as new block or as a drawing file.
